# Revitalize Legacy, Least (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Bard Spells|Bard 3]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]], [[3rd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 3]], [[3rd Level Shugenja Spells|Shugenja 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]], [[3rd Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Your legacy item; see text

**Duration:** 1 hour/level or until expended

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Weapons of Legacy (WotC), pg. 17

Choose one of your legacy item’s least legacy abilities with a daily use limit. You regain one daily use of the chosen ability. This use must be expended within the spell’s duration, or it is lost.

If all daily uses of all least legacy abilities of the item are still available, this spell has no effect (that is, it can’t increase the number of available daily uses above the normal maximum). No legacy item can be affected by this spell more than once in a 24-hour period.

*Focus:* Your legacy item, which you must be holding, wearing, or wielding.
